entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Pass in LSP document version instead of workspace document version for semantic token caching #58233
  • Change of behavior in symbol comparison with SymbolEqualityComparer #58226
  • Add a code cleanup option that turns all C# files to use file-scoped namespace #58225
  • Allow customization of auto-generated XML comments #58224
  • Ability to auto add string intrapolation character "$" at the beginning of the string if a valid "{" is typed inside the string. #58223
  • Searching for all references by child class #58222
  • Add Visual Studio settings to configure global, implicit, and global implicit usings #58221
  • Ensure Coding Styles Suggested or Refactored are Relevant to the Used / Target Version of The Language #58220
  • The classes listed by the C# overrides glyph should be sorted by their depth in the class hierarchy. #58219
  • Resolve CS0535 for methods with Async suffix by auto-implementing async methods #58218
  • Provide visual studio 2022 templates without top level statement, just make it an option #58217
  • C# Interface template is defaulted to 'internal' #58216
  • Code Cleanup: Fixer to sort fields,props, methods etc. based on preferred order #58215
  • Show references only to the selected Override method, not all the references to all the base class methods. #58214
  • When viewing options, it does not show that some have been overridden by .editorconfig . #58213
  • Non-nullable value detected as nullable #58211
  • Leading trivia contains SingleLineCommentTrivia instead of SingleLineDocumentationCommentTrivia during build #58210

Closed

  • It looks like we are lacking tests for AnalyzeDataFlow/AnalyzeControlFlow APIs across multiple top level statement, some things might not work properly. #54514
    Backlog
  • Strange behavior when passing `null` for ReadOnlyMemory/ReadOnlySpan #58160
  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58106
    17.1
  • Broken double-checked locking (data race) in RazorDocumentServiceProviderWrapper #58004
    17.1
  • Create integration tests for value tracking #53207
    17.1
  • Automatically add missing using directives #45853
    Backlog
  • Renaming file(with type) freezes UI #58188
    17.1
  • Feature xxx is currently unavailable due to an internal error. StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException: Cannot find the old value #58102
    17.1
  • new AdhocWorkspace throws NullReferenceException on API startup #58121
    17.1
  • IDE0005 not reported as build warning #58103

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58232
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58231
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Runtests experiment #58229
    Area-Interactive
  • Revert "Merge pull request #58024 from jasonmalinowski/fix-removal-an… #58228
    Area-IDE
  • NullableWalker - properly handle BoundNoPiaObjectCreationExpression #58227
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Remove usage of weak-value-source for smart-open-scope references #58212
    Area-IDE
  • SourceLink quality of life improvements #58209
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58205
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Update localized branch to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58230
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker to handle frames without text b… #58049
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update several ExpressionCompiler unit tests for inferred delegate types #58203
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers to 3.3.3 #58154
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58115
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Respond to changes in project context to support w/out navbar and mul… #58195
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • OmniSharp options #58208
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Simplify lazy initialization in RazorDocumentServiceProviderWrapper #58063
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58207
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58206
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Find unit test assemblies whose names differ from the project directory name #58194
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify how our FatalError type works and introduce a severity concept #58094
    Area-IDE
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE
  • Add and implement `IImplicitIndexerReferenceOperation` #58200
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range
  • Extract Method: top level method that is static should create a static extraction #58021
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Test, Community
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers
  • Use ElasticSpace instead of ElasticZeroSpace #58152
    Area-IDE
